headline.main: Doctors Give the A. To Audience's Q.; Doctors Give the A. to Audience's Q.

docs.lead_paragraph: ROSLYN "WHEN should I bring my daughter to a gynecologist?" Sitting on the stage of the Roslyn High School auditorium, Dr. Jerry Spiegel, an obstetrician-gynecologist, reached for a microphone to answer the question from the audience.
